ln -s /u/group/hps/hps_soft/fieldmaps fieldmap echo "Auger ID: $AUGER_ID"
set dz = `${param_dir}/dz.csh ${ebeam}` set ne = `${param_dir}/ne.csh ${ebeam}` set ebeam = `${param_dir}/ebeam.csh ${ebeam}`
#tar -xf wab.tar set mu=`/u/group/hps/production/mc/MadGraph/mu.csh $dz $ne wab.lhe.gz` echo "mu=$mu dz=$dz ne=$ne ebeam=$ebeam"
echo "Transmuting A's to photons..." gunzip -f wab.lhe.gz sed -i 's/\([:blank:]*\)622 /\1 22 /' wab.lhe gzip wab.lhe
echo "Unpacking Wide-Angle Bremsstralung events" zcat wab.lhe.gz > egs5job.inp ln -s ${egs5_dir}/data ln -s ${exe_dir}/src/esa.inp pgs5job.pegs5inp echo "11${num} $dz $ebeam 500000" > seed.dat ${exe_dir}/lhe_v1.exe cat egs5job.out
source /u/group/hps/hps_soft/setup_dst.csh
echo "Rotating Wide-Angle Bremsstrahlung events" ${stdhep_dir}/beam_coords brems.stdhep rot_wab.stdhep -s 22${num} -z -5.0 echo "Poissonizing WAB" echo "${stdhep_dir}/merge_poisson -m"$mu" -N1 -n500000 rot_wab.stdhep sampled_wab -s 23${num}" ${stdhep_dir}/merge_poisson -m"$mu" -N1 -n500000 rot_wab.stdhep sampled_wab -s 23${num}
echo "Rotating Beam" ${stdhep_dir}/beam_coords beam.stdhep rot_beam.stdhep -s 14${num} -z -5.0 echo "Sampling Beam" ${stdhep_dir}/random_sample rot_beam.stdhep sampled_beam -s 15${num}
@ file_num = ( ${num} - 1 ) % 100 + 1
echo "Rotating Hadrons" ${stdhep_dir}/beam_coords hadrons.stdhep rot_hadrons.stdhep -s 16${num} -z -5.0 ${stdhep_dir}/merge_poisson -m"-1.1" -N100 -O$file_num -n500000 rot_hadrons.stdhep sampled_hadrons -s 17${num}
echo "Merging Files" ${stdhep_dir}/merge_files sampled_beam_1.stdhep sampled_wab_1.stdhep sampled_hadrons*.stdhep wab-beam.stdhep
setenv LD_LIBRARY_PATH
bash -c 'source ${slic_dir}/init_ilcsoft.sh; exec csh' source ${slic_dir}/geant4/build-10.01.p03/geant4make.csh ${slic_dir}/geant4/build-10.01.p03 setenv GDML_SCHEMA_DIR "/u/group/hps/hps_soft/slic/schemas"
ln -s /u/group/hps/hps_soft/fieldmaps fieldmap
set seed = 18 echo "slic -i wab-beam.stdhep -g ${det_dir}/${detector}/${detector}.lcdd -o out.slcio -d$seed{${num}} -r5000000" ${slic_dir}/slic/v05-00-01/bin/slic -P /u/group/hps/hps_soft/slic/REL/slic/v05-00-01/data/particle.tbl -i wab-beam.stdhep -g ${det_dir}/${detector}/${detector}.lcdd -o out.slcio -d$seed{${num}} -r5000000|grep -vE '^$|^>>>> .+Event <[0-9]+>$| has [0-9]+ hits$' ls -ltrh /apps/scicomp/java/jdk1.7/bin/java -Xmx100m -jar ${hps-java} -r /org/hps/steering/production/DataQuality_Pass2.lcsim -i out.slcio >! data_quality.txt set nevents=`grep '^Read.*events$' data_quality.txt | cut -d' ' -f2` echo "$nevents events in output" @ seed = $seed + 1
